Package com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.Entities.EntityTypes.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxGameEntity, CircleGameEntity
    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class designed to extend from any entity based class Ensures all entities have the required methods

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected short catBits
      The category bits used for Box2D collision filtering

      The entities Box2D body

      The object attached to body and fixture userData

      void createBodyCopy()
      Create a body using the Entities already defined body definition

      Method for creating Box2D body based upon entity body definition

      Method for creating The Box2D body definition

      Method for creating Box2D fixture based upon entity fixture definition

      Create a fixture using the Entities already defined fixture definition

      method for creating Box2D fixture definition
      void createSprite()
      Creates a sprite attached to the entitity Note - will not create a sprite if its texture is null
      protected abstract void defineBox2DEntity()
      All entity subclasses need a method for creating atleast a Box2D body and fixture definition
      com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body getBody()
      Gets the body attached to this Entity instance
      com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Fixture getFixture()
      Getter for the fixture currently assigned to the entity

      All entity subclasses need a method for getting their dimensions
      protected void setBodyDefAngularDampening​(float angleDamp)
      Sets the angular dampening for all future Box2d bodies created
      protected void setBodyDefLinearDampening​(float linDamp)
      Sets the linear dampening for all future Box2d bodies created
      void setFixtureCategory​(short catBits, short maskBits)
      Sets fixture definition category bits and mask bits Note - Used for collision filtering
      void setFixtureDefSensor​(java.lang.Boolean val)
      Sets the currently assigned entity fixture definition to be a sensor so all future fixtures created would have the sensor property you define (Generates collision callbacks but without colliding with any Box2D object)
      void setSensor​(boolean val)
      Sets the currently assigned entity fixture to be a sensor(Generates collision callbacks but without colliding with any object)
      void setShape​(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Shape shape)
      Setter for the class variable entityShape Sets the shape for the Bodies created by this entity
      void setSpawnPosition​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos)
      Set the position that all future bodies will be created at
      void setUserData​(java.lang.Object userData)
      Sets the user data of the spawned fixture and body curently attached to this entity
      void storeUserData​(java.lang.Object userData)
      Stores the userData to be used for all future body and fixture creations

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        protected Entity​(PlayScreen screen,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 sizeDims,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos,
                 java.lang.String textureFilePath,
                 boolean isStatic,
                 int spriteLayer)
        A constructor defining all entity properties
        Parameters:
        screen - The Screen the entity object is located and will be created
        sizeDims - The size dimensions of the entity in meters
        pos - The position the variable is at in meters
        textureFilePath - The file path to the texture for the sprite, NOTE - If this is null a sprite will not be created
        isStatic - A boolean stating whether the Box2D body is static (For true) or Dynamic (For false)
        spriteLayer - The draw layer the sprite will be drawn on, used to determine draw order. 0 Is the bottom layer

        Sets the angular dampening for all future Box2d bodies created
        Parameters:

      • setFixtureCategory

        public void setFixtureCategory​(short catBits,
                               short maskBits)
        Sets fixture definition category bits and mask bits Note - Used for collision filtering
        Parameters:
        catBits - The category bits used for Box2D collision filtering
        maskBits - The mask bits used for Box2D collision filtering

      • storeUserData

        public void storeUserData​(java.lang.Object userData)
        Stores the userData to be used for all future body and fixture creations

        The user data should be an instance of the final subclass extending Entity

        Parameters:
        userData - The userData you wish all future body and fixtures to have, should be an instance of the final subclass extending Entity

      • getBody

        public com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body getBody()
        Gets the body attached to this Entity instance
        Returns:
        Returns this entities body

      • setFixtureDefSensor

        public void setFixtureDefSensor​(java.lang.Boolean val)
        Sets the currently assigned entity fixture definition to be a sensor so all future fixtures created would have the sensor property you define (Generates collision callbacks but without colliding with any Box2D object)
        Parameters:
        val - Boolean for whether the entity's fixture definition is a sensor

      • setSpawnPosition

        public void setSpawnPosition​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos)
        Set the position that all future bodies will be created at
        Parameters:
        pos - The position in meters all future bodies will spawn at

      • setSensor

        public void setSensor​(boolean val)
        Sets the currently assigned entity fixture to be a sensor(Generates collision callbacks but without colliding with any object)
        Parameters:
        val - Boolean for whether the entity's fixture is a sensor

        Parameters:
